name: 2018/11/12Dinner Grapes and beef
description: Indulge in a healthy and delectable low-carb dinner with our 'Grapes and Beef' recipe. Specially designed for those looking for high-sodium, healthified recipes, this dish combines the freshness of grapes with the rich flavor of ground beef and mixed Chinese vegetables. Perfect for those pursuing a balanced and nutritious eating plan.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse 50g of grapes under cold water and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Prep the 15.00g of Ginisang Pechay by washing and chopping it into bite-size pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare 2.47 ounces of Beef Ground Mexican (Bison) by breaking it into smaller chunks for even cooking.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse and drain 56.50 grams of Mixed Chinese Vegetables.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: In a skillet over medium heat, cook the ground beef for 10 minutes or until browned and cooked through.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Add the mixed Chinese vegetables and ginisang pechay to the skillet, cooking for an additional 5 minutes until the vegetables are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Gently toss in the grapes, cooking for an additional 5 minutes to allow the flavors to meld.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot and enjoy a nutritious, healthified dinner.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
